venue.name: University of Connecticut Greater Hartford Campus

item.description:
Join The CT Theatre Group And The Connecticut Guitar Society For A Great Night Of Music And New Friends

The Connecticut Guitar Society will present an evening of music by Thomas Schuttenhelm. With guest artists Dick Provost (guitar), Christopher Ladd (guitar), Anton Miller (violin), Janet Arms (flute), Robert Black (bass), and others from the guitar, strings, and wind departments at the University of Hartford, Hartt School.

The concert will feature the premiere of 'Symphonia Concertante' for violin and guitar, as well as a new three movement work for guitar quartet. In addition, the CT Guitar Society Guitar Ensemble will give short recital immediately preceding the concert in the Library Auditorium at the
University of Connecticut West Hartford Campus

Visit: http://www.thomasschu...

Tickets are $20

The show starts at 8pm

NOTE: There will be a special opening act at 7pm
â€“ The Connecticut Guitar Society Ensemble plays from 7pm to 7:30pm

at

University of Connecticut
Greater Hartford Campus
1800 Asylum Ave
West Hartford, CT 06117

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888

We have 20 tickets available, so get your ticket today before we sell out!

The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show

Info will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket holders

Pick up your ticket before the show with the CT Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

DIRECTIONS

Take Exit 43 off of i-84 West or i-84 East, for Park Road (0.5 mi)

Turn right onto Park Road **Stay in the Middle lane (Trout Brook Dr North ONLY). (75ft)

Take immediate Left onto Trout Brook Drive (1.7 mi)

Beyond the intersection of Trout Brook Drive and Asylum Ave

Take a right into Students' and Visitor's Parking lot.

Campus is located across the street from Parking lot.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show to extend the party Details will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders
